== Introduction ==
Msmtp is a SMTP client. It is capable of sending e-mail messages to SMTP server that in turn relays the message on. The homepage for msmtp is <nowiki>[[http://msmtp.sourceforge.net|http://msmtp.sourceforge.net]]</nowiki>, it contains lots of documentation and descriptions of the program's capabilities.
